name: compute_sample_coverage
title: Compute sample coverage
summary: Compute a sample coverage track from a BAM file
description: This app computes a coverage track from a collection of mappings given in a BAM file. The bedtools genomecov command is used to compute the coverage values, which are output in a file in the bedGraph format. Additional metadata, such as a sample name and a set of properties, may optionally be provided in the input.
